title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: July 10, 2023, 03:08:31 AMLast edit: July 14, 2023, 08:08:06 PM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Up for auction are 10 Balletcrypto wallets that were made for ordinalsbot and were available only at the Miami Bitcoin conference this past May.Each are loaded as follows: .00000546 BTC, an inscription and 100 ZBIT - read more on ZBIT here https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/zbit-ordinalsTHIS IS FOR 10 LOTS OF 1 CARD PER LOT. WILL WORK ON A LIFO BASIS AND STARTING BID 0.0003 BTC MINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001 BTC END TIME: Friday, July 14th, 15:00 (3:00 pm) ESTWhen placing your bid, please post your username followed by bid amountExample:MoparMiningLLC - 3 @ .0003 BTC**Payment due within 48 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.Basically, auction ends at the appointed time - unless extended - if extended the auction ends once 5 minutes elapse with no bids.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC and only to this address: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4es Bitcoin via LN to this address: moparmining@walletofsatoshi.com - if need an LNURL or invoice instead of LN address - just let me know.if you get a pm to pay any other way - ignore it, it will not be from me.Shipping can be done in one of three methods:1. directly by me - add an additional $5 to the bid amount when paying if you want a direct shipment.2. item can be hodl'd by me for consolidation with future orders/sales.3. item can be provided to minerjones for consolidation with other orders and reshipping. There is no fee for me to provide them to minerjones.

comments.body: thanks for starting it off guys!current winning bids:Agrawas 6 @ .0005suzuki matt 2 @ .0006DirtyBirdE 2 @ .0006

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: KROGOTH 1@0.0006BTC  I presume these are using a Taproot BTC addy for the inscription on them?  They look really cool and would be a great addition if I win to my ballet collection

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on July 10, 2023, 12:23:37 PMKROGOTH 1@0.0006BTC  I presume these are using a Taproot BTC addy for the inscription on them?  They look really cool and would be a great addition if I win to my ballet collectionthe sending address is a bc1p - taproot, however the cards receiving address is a bc1q - native segwit.current winning bids:Agrawas 2 @ .0005suzuki matt 2 @ .0006DirtyBirdE 2 @ .0006Tweetious 2 @ .0006krogothmanhattan: 1 @.0006JanEmil: 1 @ .001

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on July 10, 2023, 01:28:30 PMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on July 10, 2023, 12:23:37 PMKROGOTH 1@0.0006BTC  I presume these are using a Taproot BTC addy for the inscription on them?  They look really cool and would be a great addition if I win to my ballet collectionthe sending address is a bc1p - taproot, however the cards receiving address is a bc1q - native segwit.  Thanks for the info! I figured the Inscription addy used was Taproot.   So it also has a native segwit as well in case I want to load the card with BTC?    Good to know if I ever win and wanna load the card...thanks!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on July 10, 2023, 03:32:55 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on July 10, 2023, 01:28:30 PMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on July 10, 2023, 12:23:37 PMKROGOTH 1@0.0006BTC  I presume these are using a Taproot BTC addy for the inscription on them?  They look really cool and would be a great addition if I win to my ballet collectionthe sending address is a bc1p - taproot, however the cards receiving address is a bc1q - native segwit.  Thanks for the info! I figured the Inscription addy used was Taproot.   So it also has a native segwit as well in case I want to load the card with BTC?    Good to know if I ever win and wanna load the card...thanks!I am no expert on inscriptions but I believe the taproot aspect is what allows them to exceed the limit normally placed on the OPRETURN and now use the full block size if they so choose - and also to exploit the MEV.I may be partially wrong or fully wrong - but that is my understanding.

comments.author: YodasRedRocket
comments.body: Just an FYI for members new to Ordinals.. the .00000546 BTC is actually the ordinals inscription that is the Zbits which are brc-20 tokens on the bitcoin blockchain.
